text:
## How to add hyperlinks and documents as quick links on the homepage?

Curricula provides the **Quick links** section on the **Home** page for
branding and customisation. Alex is the LMS admin in an organisation and he
has been assigned as the application admin of Curricula. He wants to share the
official website and brochure with all learners and staff in his organisation.
Let’s see how Alex will add a hyperlink and document to the **Home** page.

1\. In Curricula, Alex clicks **Admin** on the left navigation pane, and then
clicks **Global settings**.

2\. In the **Quick links** tab, he uploads a file from his local device.

3\. Alex can also add a hyperlink.

***Note** : Up to nine files and hyperlinks can be added as quick links.

4\. When he finishes adding the quick links, he clicks **Save**. The learners
and staff will see the quick links on the **Home** page.
